name: LJ International Inc.
description: LJ International Inc. is a globally recognized jewelry manufacturer and retailer, primarily known for its exquisite diamond and gemstone jewelry. Established in 1987, the company has its manufacturing facilities located in China and markets its products across various international markets, including the United States, Europe, and Asia. LJ International operates under the brand name 'LJI' and is committed to providing high-quality jewelry at competitive prices. The company specializes in a wide range of jewelry products, including engagement rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets, catering to diverse consumer preferences. With a strong focus on design innovation and quality craftsmanship, LJ International has built a solid reputation in the jewelry industry. The company emphasizes sustainable practices and ethical sourcing of materials, aligning with modern consumer values. By leveraging advanced technology in manufacturing and design, LJ International strives to meet the evolving demands of the global jewelry market while maintaining its commitment to excellence. The company is also exploring opportunities in e-commerce to enhance its distribution channels and better serve its customers worldwide.

seo.meta_title: LJ International Inc. | Quality Diamond and Gemstone Jewelry
seo.meta_description: Discover LJ International Inc., a leading manufacturer of high-quality diamond and gemstone jewelry. Explore our exquisite collections and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does LJ International specialize in?
faq.answer: LJ International specializes in high-quality diamond and gemstone jewelry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of LJ International?
faq.answer: Lin Li is the CEO of LJ International Inc.

faq.question: Where is LJ International headquartered?
faq.answer: LJ International is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does LJ International offer?
faq.answer: LJ International offers a variety of jewelry products including engagement rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets.
